name: Solar 2033 - Space Rover Program
description:
🌕 Solar 2033 is a space racing game about exploring the solar system using moon, venus and mars rover. 

📱 Available on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gmail.zayceffdev.solar2033rovers

🚀 You can get to many planets, each of them is unique and contains its own surprises - storms, acid rain, mirages and much more!

Features:
⚡ More than 100 levels to complete.
⚡ Many different rovers - flying, fast, military and many others.
⚡ Rover Upgrade System - upgrade your shield, batteries, power units and more.
⚡ Control with one hand and one finger (mobile devices) or only mouse (desktop).
